sentence.Network_en: However, many customers found the smell of this product distinctly off-putting.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而，很多顾客觉得该产品有一股异味，非常难闻。

sentence.Network_en: I find his manner very off-putting.
sentence.Network_cn: 我觉得他的举止令人颇为厌恶。

sentence.Network_en: The computer made a buzzing noise that she found off - putting.
sentence.Network_cn: 计算机发出的嗡嗡声让她心烦.

entry.tran: （某物的特性或特定方面）令人讨厌的，惹人不快的，让人避而远之的
entry.def: If you describe a quality or feature of something as off-putting, you mean that it makes you dislike that thing or not want to get involved with it.

example.ex: However, many customers found the smell of this product distinctly off-putting.
example.tran: 然而，很多顾客觉得该产品有一股异味，非常难闻。

sentences.sentence: "The trappings of upper-class life are off-putting and sterile"- Elizabeth Hess

sentences.en: I find it very off-putting to have someone watching me all the time.
